name: Izana
description:
Izana is a beat-em-up platformer, based on the japanese myth of Izanagi and Izanami.

You play as Izanagi, japanese god of creation, and suddenly you find yourself in a futuristic version of your land, Japan. You'll have to jump through obstacles and fight futuristic versions of well known monsters of the japanese folklore.

  • After the game testing:

After testing, I would require you to fill a Google Forms that has simple checkmark questions because I need to show the stats on my presentation. It's all anonymous so don't worry.

Thanks in advance and I hope you enjoy the prototype!

All feedback is appreciated :)
